seg-source.mrk: COUNT function

target.mrk: COUNT function

trans-unit.source: COUNT is an aggregate function that counts the number of rows accessed in an expression. COUNT is allowed on all types of expressions.

seg-source.mrk: COUNT is an aggregate function that counts the number of rows accessed in an expression.
COUNT is allowed on all types of expressions.

target.mrk: COUNT is an aggregate function that counts the number of rows accessed in an expression.
COUNT is allowed on all types of expressions.

seg-source.mrk: COUNT aggregate function

target.mrk: COUNT aggregate function

seg-source.mrk: DISTINCT

target.mrk: DISTINCT

seg-source.mrk: qualifier in COUNT aggregate function

target.mrk: qualifier in COUNT aggregate function

trans-unit.source: See <xref href="rrefsqlj33923.dita#rrefsqlj33923"></xref> for more information about these functions.

seg-source.mrk: See <xref href="rrefsqlj33923.dita#rrefsqlj33923"></xref> for more information about these functions.

target.mrk: See <xref href="rrefsqlj33923.dita#rrefsqlj33923"></xref> for more information about these functions.

seg-source.mrk: Syntax

target.mrk: Syntax

seg-source.mrk: COUNT ( [ DISTINCT | ALL ] expression )

target.mrk: COUNT ( [ DISTINCT | ALL ] expression )

trans-unit.source: The DISTINCT qualifier eliminates duplicates. The ALL qualifier retains duplicates. ALL is assumed if neither ALL nor DISTINCT is specified. For example, if a column contains the values 1, 1, 1, 1, and 2, COUNT(col) returns a greater value than COUNT(DISTINCT col).

seg-source.mrk: The DISTINCT qualifier eliminates duplicates.
The ALL qualifier retains duplicates.
ALL is assumed if neither ALL nor DISTINCT is specified.
For example, if a column contains the values 1, 1, 1, 1, and 2, COUNT(col) returns a greater value than COUNT(DISTINCT col).

target.mrk: The DISTINCT qualifier eliminates duplicates.
The ALL qualifier retains duplicates.
ALL is assumed if neither ALL nor DISTINCT is specified.
For example, if a column contains the values 1, 1, 1, 1, and 2, COUNT(col) returns a greater value than COUNT(DISTINCT col).

trans-unit.source: Only one DISTINCT aggregate expression per selectExpression is allowed. For example, the following query is not allowed:

seg-source.mrk: Only one DISTINCT aggregate expression per selectExpression is allowed.
For example, the following query is not allowed:

target.mrk: Only one DISTINCT aggregate expression per selectExpression is allowed.
For example, the following query is not allowed:

trans-unit.source: -- query not allowed SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT flying_time), SUM (DISTINCT miles) FROM Flights

seg-source.mrk: -- query not allowed SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT flying_time), SUM (DISTINCT miles) FROM Flights

target.mrk: -- query not allowed SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT flying_time), SUM (DISTINCT miles) FROM Flights

trans-unit.source: An expression can contain multiple column references or expressions, but it cannot contain another aggregate or subquery. If an expression evaluates to NULL, the aggregate is not processed for that value.

seg-source.mrk: An expression can contain multiple column references or expressions, but it cannot contain another aggregate or subquery.
If an expression evaluates to NULL, the aggregate is not processed for that value.

target.mrk: An expression can contain multiple column references or expressions, but it cannot contain another aggregate or subquery.
If an expression evaluates to NULL, the aggregate is not processed for that value.

trans-unit.source: The resulting data type of COUNT is <xref href="rrefsqlj10696.dita#rrefsqlj10696">INTEGER</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The resulting data type of COUNT is <xref href="rrefsqlj10696.dita#rrefsqlj10696">INTEGER</xref>.

target.mrk: The resulting data type of COUNT is <xref href="rrefsqlj10696.dita#rrefsqlj10696">INTEGER</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: -- Count the number of countries in each region, -- show only regions that have at least 2 SELECT COUNT (country), region FROM Countries GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT (country) > 1

seg-source.mrk: -- Count the number of countries in each region, -- show only regions that have at least 2 SELECT COUNT (country), region FROM Countries GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT (country) > 1

target.mrk: -- Count the number of countries in each region, -- show only regions that have at least 2 SELECT COUNT (country), region FROM Countries GROUP BY region HAVING COUNT (country) > 1
